toggle-toggle-sprint.name: Toggle Toggle Sprint
toggle-toggle-sprint.noYacl: This requires Yet Another Config Lib to be installed!
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintOnJoin.descri: If enabled, you'll start sprinting upon joining a world if your sprint key is set to toggle
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.descrip: Changes your default state for sprinting when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.on: Your sprint option will be changed to Toggle when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.off: Your sprint option will be changed to Hold when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sprintState.unchang: Your sprint option won't be changed when joining a world
When enabled, the toggle key will also simulate a sprint key press when activated
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakOnJoin.descrip: If enabled, you'll start sneaking whenever you join a world if your sneak key is set to toggle
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakOnJoin.warning: WARNING: Some servers may consider this to be a cheat, use at your own risk!
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.descript: Changes your default state for sneaking when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.on: Your sneak option will be changed to Toggle when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.off: Your sneak option will be changed to Hold when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.sneakState.unchange: Your sneak option won't be changed when joining a world
toggle-toggle-sprint.alsoStartSneaking.d: When enabled, the toggle key will also simulate a sneak key press when activated
